registry.title: Registry
registry.intro: Mahalo for being part of our celebration. While your presence is our greatest gift, for those who have asked, we've created two options to help us begin our new chapter:

traditional.title: Traditional Registry
traditional.description: A curated selection of items to help us build our home together in paradise.

honeymoon.title: Honeymoon Fund
honeymoon.description: Help us create more memories once this party is over.
